review_title: Perfect Hydration in a Convenient Travel Size!
review_text: I received this hydration body lotion as a trial product, and I really liked it! It worked wonderfully on my skin, leaving my body feeling perfectly moisturized. The travel size was a great bonus‚Äîeasy to take with you wherever you go. The scent was pleasant, and the consistency/texture of the lotion was just right, with nothing to complain about. I have sensitive skin, and I had no reactions, which is a huge plus for me. Overall, a great product for anyone looking for effective hydration in a convenient size!

This hydrating lotion keeps your skin looking glowy and hydrated for sometime. The scent is not strong. The ingredients are natural which doesn‚Äôt worry me about dealing with an allergic reaction or breakouts. The packing is nic and convenient to use. The quality of the product is great and really helps soothe any irritated dry skin.

Good smell, not too strong, and soaks into the sink nicely. Ended up giving the bottle to my grandmother who enjoyed it so much! It didn‚Äôt bother her sensitive skin and no residue like some other lotions. We both like that it moisturized enough to lasted quite some time.

Not oily. Seems to be easily absorbed to the skin. Love the soothing smell of lemongrass and lavender. I find that they go well together. The lemongrass scent seems a lot stronger than the lavender scent. Pretty packaging. No nasties. Very moisturizing.  Suitable for sensitive skin. Good size. Neither too small nor too big. A little goes a long way.

It is a bargain for the size.  I use it on my hands and a little goes a long way. It isn't as thick as I like, but it doesn't claim to be, so there is that. I would say it is a good quality lotion and the scent is amazing without all the yucky stuff.

Love the scent of this! I use this every now and then, especially during winter season where skin becomes really dry, it helps a lot to stay moisturized. Suitable for sensitive skin. Product is a good size and definitely able to use for a long time. I really love the scent and just leave you feeling good!

I only buy non-toxic personal care products these days and this lotion doesn‚Äôt disappoint. It‚Äôs natural, non-toxic, and has nourishing ingredients. This lotion smells calming and it makes my skin so smooth and soft. I use this on my hands and entire body and it has zero greasy or sticky feeling yet moisturizes so well. The scent is so good!

The lotion has a light, refreshing scent that combines the calming properties of lavender with the invigorating aroma of lemongrass. It‚Äôs perfect for daily use and leaves my skin feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated. The formula is enriched with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E, and natural oils, which provide excellent moisture without feeling greasy.

One of the standout features is that it is pH balanced and cruelty-free, which aligns with my values. Additionally, it is formulated without sulfates, parabens, or phthalates, making it a safe and gentle option for my skin.

This cream is so hydrating! My skin was so dry and this cream saved it! I'm using it at night after I wash my face. Don't put it right before you go to sleep. The scent is great also the packaging. Its not for oily skin for sure and it's a little pricey.

review_title: In love with this hand cream
review_text:
Scent: Subtle, pleasing fragrance that enhances the overall sensory experience.

review_title: Mild By Nature Hydrating Body Lotion works
review_text: This lavender lemongrass scented body lotion provides a scent that is light and not offensive. The feel of this body lotion is soft and pleasant on the skin. It softens dry skin, making one want to use it more than just once a day. Plus the ingredients, as mentioned on the container, do help me have soft, smooth, healthier looking skin. The extra bonus is that it is formulated without sulfates,  parabens or phthalates.

The Moisturizing Cream has transformed my dry skin. Its rich texture spreads easily and absorbs quickly, leaving my skin moisturized without any greasy feeling. It creates a protective barrier and has improved the overall hydration of my skin, making it softer and smoother. The cream contains beneficial ingredients like ceramides. Highly recommended for its effectiveness.

This lotion is light but still quite hydrating, so you will have breathable skin after application.  The scent is not very rich and personally I think it is good as you need to apply a certain amount for your whole body.  The tube is large so it can probably last for quite a while.

I really like this lotion which has a thick composition and is more like a cream. it goes on very smooth and hydrates/moisturizes my skin very well. I use it daily on both body and hands. it has a mild scent not overpowering. the size is great for the price.

I like this good quality lotion for my hands , legs and arms. The composition of ingredients feels smooth and not sticky , like some lotions. The moisturizing benefit has been good for my sensitive dry skin. I would recommend this lotion that you can also use for travel or carry in your purse.

Love this quality lotion for hands and body. Great size tube lasts a long time. Lovely smooth texture that dries without greasiness. I enjoy the scent as it benefits the senses. Nice composition and will moisturize dry skin. Good on sensitive skin. This cream is of use to any age group. Package is big and at a great price.

I mainly applied this cream to my hands and it hydrated them perfectly. It has a fresh and pleasant aroma, ideal for those who are sensitive to strong odors. The texture and quality are very delicate and light. The compact size of the package is an outstanding advantage and is ideal for travel. I find this to be a delightful addition to my skincare routine.

I have purchased a few of this product as I find it to be very moisterizing particularly for my arms and legs as they tend to dry out more quickly than other parts of my body. I like the fact there are limited harsh chemicals in the product and are mostly natural. The smell is very subtle and pleasant but not overbearing. This size lasts me quite some time and I have  purchased the smaller tube if the other is out of stock. Will keep on buying it.

This lotion has an amazing scent and I enjoy using this liberally. It absorbs quickly and easily into damp or dry skin. It's a generous quantity per bottle and will last a long while. Quality of the product is good and consistency is creamy. I would Definitely buy this again.

I got a sample size of this and just had to buy the full size of the production multiple varieties. This lotion is comparable to other brands with none of the artificial flavors or chemicals found in products from beauty stores. I love the soothing scent and this is a wonderful creamy formula. I have sensitive skin and I have had no issues here! Great value for the size of the product. My dry skin is loving this product!

The scent of this lotion is very soothing and relaxing‚Äînice when you get done with a bath or hot showers it blends into skin easily and seems to really moisturize nicely. I plan to purchase a larger size soon. I love that I was able to try a trial size at very low cost.

review_title: Mild By Nature's Lavender Lemongrass Lotion: My Daily Dose of Hydration
review_text: Mild By Nature's Hydrating Body Lotion in Lavender Lemongrass has become my personal retreat into a world of tranquility and moisturization. Each application of this 8 fl oz potion leaves my skin feeling deeply nourished and rejuvenated. The harmonious blend of lavender and lemongrass emits a calming aroma that envelopes me in a soothing sensory experience. It's the little moments of self-care that this lotion provides that I cherish the most. Infusing daily hydration with a serene ambiance, this lotion is a beautiful reminder that self-love is just a pump away

review_title: Very good lotion with lovely scent
review_text: I really like this lotion. It‚Äôs fairly thick, but spreads well.  Very pleasing, fresh but subtle scent. Convenient travel size, and moisturizing enough to use as a hand lotion.

The Hydrating Body Lotion in Lavender Lemongrass is an exceptional product for anyone looking for a luxurious and nourishing body lotion. I have been using this lotion for a few weeks now, and I am very impressed with the results.

One of the things I love about this lotion is its unique scent. The combination of lavender and lemongrass is refreshing and invigorating, making it a perfect lotion to use after a long day. It leaves a light and pleasant fragrance on the skin that lasts for hours.

Another thing I appreciate about this lotion is its lightweight and fast-absorbing formula. It glides smoothly onto the skin and absorbs quickly, leaving no greasy or sticky feeling. It is also enriched with natural ingredients like aloe vera, shea butter, and vitamin E, which help to nourish and moisturize the skin deeply.

After using this lotion regularly, I have noticed a significant improvement in my skin's texture and overall hydration. My skin feels soft, supple, and deeply nourished. It also looks brighter and more even-toned, with a healthy glow.

Overall, I highly recommend Hydrating Body Lotion in Lavender Lemongrass to anyone looking for a high-quality and luxurious body lotion. It is an affordable and safe product that has exceeded my expectations, and I am confident it will do the same for you.

review_title: Fragrance Lovely, Doesn't Feel Hydrating Later
review_text: I love the scent - it's both sweet, floral and spicy.  Kind of unique, and different from a straight lavender. So stars for aromatherapy. Unfortunately, like many lotions I find that after ten minutes or so my skin feels a little dry.  That took stars back off. It's a fairly light consistency.  Even though it's not heavy like a foot cream needs to be, I'm using it that way (with fuzzy socks) just for a spa-like pick-me-up to feel a little pampered because the fragrance is so nice. Worth trying the sample as I think everyone reacts to lotions a little differently and it might be perfect for someone else.

review_title: It's a body lotion, not a shower gel
review_text: Although I was expecting a shower lotion, but just as a body lotion it's a great cream - good quality, it's easy to use and the smell is very good - small and compact size for traveling and just to leave in the office or throw in a bag - pleasant texture and leaves the skin full of moisture.

It was on sale so I bought it. Does it smell like ginger? It also smells like. Personally, I think it would have been better if the lavender was a little stronger. The size is larger than I expected and I think the cost performance is good. I have very dry skin, so I feel like this is perfect for the spring/summer season. I didn't experience any irritation while using it, so I think it can be used even on sensitive skin.

Cream with a pleasant lavender smell, convenient packaging, good composition. But this product is more about fragrances than about hydration or nutrition. It didn't suit me - too weak. After application, it quickly absorbed, as if it had not been lubricated with anything, the effect was practically absent. review_title: No sticky stuff! Refreshing and good scent for a change of mood ‚óé
review_text: I was looking for a good scented hand cream. It's for the body, but I use it instead of hand cream. First of all, I like that there is no sticky feeling at all! The cream I was using until now was put on the futon immediately after applying it, and every time I touched the clothes, sheets, or futon cover, it would get stuck, and it would irritate me and cause itching, making my dry eczema even worse. rice field. This one doesn't have that, so it's very stress-free. Even if you apply it with the palm of your hand, it will be smooth, so even if you apply it before driving, the steering wheel will not be sticky. Also, it smells great! It has a strong scent, so I don't think it's suitable for applying while preparing meals, but it's perfect for relaxing time, such as when the housework is finished or before going to bed. Many people don't like the scent of lavender alone, but this one contains lemongrass, so the lingering scent is refreshing. The oil in the cream doesn't seem to be evenly distributed, and the strength of the two scents changes each time I use it, which is also fun. Recently, the price has been lowered frequently at sales, so I'm nervous about the end of the sale. I plan to order more before I run out.
